plugins.name: Ant Design
plugins.description: A design system for enterprise-level products. Create an efficient and enjoyable work experience.

plugins.name: CSS / styled-jsx
plugins.description: CRA comes with built-in support for CSS and CSS Modules.

plugins.name: React Redux
plugins.description: Redux helps you write applications that behave consistently, run in different environments (client, server, and native), and are easy to test.

plugins.name: next-i18next
plugins.description: react-i18next is a powerful internationalization framework for React / React Native which is based on i18next. Check out the history of i18next and when react-i18next was introduced.

plugins.name: Testing Library
plugins.description: The React Testing Library is a very light-weight solution for testing React components. It provides light utility functions on top of react-dom and react-dom/test-utils.
